info.name: ₹iddhi Finance API
info.description:
Complete REST API collection for ₹iddhi — a full-stack personal finance management application.

## Setup
1. Set the `baseUrl` variable to `http://localhost:3000`
2. Call **Login** to get a token — it is saved automatically to the `token` variable.
3. All protected routes use `Bearer {{token}}` auth.

## Auth Pattern
All protected endpoints require the `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}` header, which is pre-configured on every folder.

variable.description: Base URL of the API server
JWT Bearer token — set automatically after Login
Authenticated user's ID — set automatically after Login

Comma-separated: individual_stock, etf, mutual_fund, bond, crypto, options, reit, other

Get a single investment holding by ID.

Add a new investment holding.

**Asset classes**: `stocks`, `bonds`, `cash`, `alternatives`, `real_estate`, `other`
**Types**: `individual_stock`, `etf`, `mutual_fund`, `bond`, `crypto`, `options`, `reit`, `other`
